title: Lakitu

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Spiny Throw**: Throw a Spiny near someone, they will be Roleblocked the next time they visit a Koopa, Will fail if used on a player that already has a Spiny.
- **Spiny Storm** (1x): Create an army of Spiny to protect all Koopas, anyone visiting Koopa members this night will be roleblocked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a Spiny attemps to Roleblock someone Roleblock immune, they will be dealt a Basic attack, and their action will fail if they die.
- You will know when a Spiny has Roleblocked/Attacked someone.

desc:
Post 1623
*It's a member of the Koopa clan that rides on clouds, It attacks by throwing Spiny Eggs.*
